item.title: CCPD Virtual Summer Series: Velan Studios | June 03
item.description: Velan Studios will be hosting a virtual info session on Tuesday, June 3rd, 2025 to discuss life at the company and their internship and co-op opportunities! Log on and learn more about available opportunities with them. This session will begin at 4:30pm and is 45 minutes in duration. Additional details, registration, and available positions can be found in Handshake.
item.author: Students

item.title: Webinars to be Included in Webex Suite
item.description: The Webex Suite meeting platform will include Webinars as of May 29, 2025. All Webinars, including those scheduled prior to this date but running after May 29, will be run on the new platform. In order to utilize the new experience, the installed Webex App must be version 45.4 or newer. If you need assistance to update your Webex App, please submit a support request.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Capital Region Basketball Camp at RPI!
item.description: The Capital Region Basketball Camp for kids age 8-15, is a unique summer camp in which RPI Head Men’s Basketball Coach Mark Gilbride, and his staff have designed programs to develop all facets of each camper’s game, as well as help increase their individual and team skills in an atmosphere that is challenging, competitive, and fun. Enjoy the convenience of dropping your child off at a sports camp right where you work!
